product_name: Columbia Saturday Trail Stretch Convertible Pants - Women's
long_description: Ideal for backpacking and extended travel, the lightweight Columbia Saturday Trail Stretch convertible pants offer a convenient 2-in-1 style that saves weight and space. Stretchy nylon fabric is durable, abrasion resistant and packable; Omni-Shield&8482; treatment repels light moisture. Pant legs zip off, converting the pants to shorts with a 10 in. inseam in warm weather; zip the legs back on for increased coverage and warmth. With a UPF 50 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Saturday Trail Stretch convertible pants have hand pockets with mesh linings and 1 zippered security pocket on right thigh. Gusseted crotch facilitates freedom of movement for increased comfort. Relaxed fit and high rise waist.
